sentence.Network_en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentence.Network_en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
sentence.Network_cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

sentence.Network_en: The shark was writhing around wildly, trying to get free.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲨鱼拼命挣扎，试图逃脱。

entry.tran: 难对付的;令人厌烦的;令人恼火的
entry.def: If you describe something or someone as trying, you mean that they are difficult to deal with and make you feel impatient or annoyed.

example.ex: Support from those closest to you is vital in these trying times...
example.tran: 在这些困难的时刻，最亲近的人给予你的支持至关重要。

example.ex: The whole business has been very trying.
example.tran: 整个事情一直令人非常头疼。

auth_sentence.content: But wi-fi providers are constantly trying to catch up.
auth_sentence.res_content: But wi-fi providers are constantly trying to catch up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But wi-fi providers are constantly trying to catch up.

auth_sentence.content: We're trying to change the graduates' minds.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're trying to change the graduates' minds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're trying to change the graduates' minds.

auth_sentence.content: We're trying to write good stuff on it.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're trying to write good stuff on it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're trying to write good stuff on it.

Sentence.sentence: Kodak is an example of a firm that was very much aware that they had to adapt, and spent a lot of money trying to do so, but ultimately failed.
The car driver was trying to avoid hitting a rabbit.
With Mr Jobs gone, Apple is just one of many technology firms trying to arouse his uncontrollable spirit in new products.

means.word_mean: 困难的, 令人难受的, 磨炼人的

sentences.en: It had been a most trying experience for him.
sentences.cn: 这对他是一段非常难受的经历。

means.word_mean: (虽然没有成功但是)已经尽力了；并非努力不够

sentences.en: He’s had no success in finding a job, though not for lack of trying.
sentences.cn: 他到现在还没找到工作，不过他很努力地找了。
